body: The universe is big. It’s vast and complicated and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles.
author: Doctor Who
title: Season 5, Episode 12

body: You want weapons? We’re in a library! Books! The best weapons in the world!
author: Doctor Who
title: Season 2, Episode 2

body: Some people live more in 20 years than others do in 80. It’s not the time that matters, it’s the person.
author: Doctor Who
title: Season 3, Episode 6

body: In 900 years of time and space, I’ve never met anyone who wasn’t important.
author: Doctor Who
title: Season 6, Christmas Special

body: We’re all stories, in the end. Just make it a good one, eh?
author: Doctor Who
title: Season 5, Episode 13

body: We’re all stories, in the end. Just make it a good one, eh?
author: Doctor Who
title: Season 5, Episode 13
